page.title: 05Interests & Hobbies Kinbrace
page.content: One of the main hobbies is fishing. There are several lochs to go fishing on for trout and there is a part of the River Helmsdale where local people can fish for salmon. Bird watching and horse riding are hobbies of two of the children in our school. C.B.radio and computers are a great craze. Half the population have C.B. radios. Some have them for their work and others for keeping in touch with local news. Television is what everyone depends on for their enjoyment. Two fathers of children in our school are amateur radio enthusiasts. Some older folks like gardening and clay pigeon shooting. The teenagers' hobbies are scrambling on motor cycles and playing darts. Another hobby of some of the children and teacher in our school is gold panning. One can find gold in the burns near our school!
